languages.text: "Отличный план, проктор. Только суровые меры вернут порядок".
"A sound plan, Proctor. Only harsh measures can restore order."
languages.original_text: "Отличный план, проктор. Только суровые меры вернут порядок".

traits.locale_text: "A sound plan, Proctor. Only harsh measures can restore order."
"A sound plan, Proctor. Only harsh measures can restore order."
"A sound plan, Proctor. Only harsh measures can restore order."
"A sound plan, Proctor. Only harsh measures can restore order."
"A sound plan, Proctor. Only harsh measures can restore order."
"A sound plan, Proctor. Only harsh measures can restore order."

languages.text: "Ein vernünftiger Plan, Proktor. Nur harte Maßnahmen können die Ordnung wiederherstellen."
languages.original_text: "A sound plan, Proctor. Only harsh measures can restore order."

traits.locale_text: "Ein vernünftiger Plan, Proktor. Nur harte Maßnahmen können die Ordnung wiederherstellen."

languages.text: « Voilà un plan qui me semble approprié, proctor. Seules des mesures draconiennes pourront rétablir l'ordre. »
languages.original_text: "A sound plan, Proctor. Only harsh measures can restore order."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà un plan qui me semble approprié, proctor. Seules des mesures draconiennes pourront rétablir l'ordre. »

languages.text: «Me parece un buen plan, Procurador. El orden solo puede imponerse tomando medidas drásticas».
languages.original_text: "A sound plan, Proctor. Only harsh measures can restore order."

traits.locale_text: «Me parece un buen plan, Procurador. El orden solo puede imponerse tomando medidas drásticas».

languages.text: “这个计划很可靠，监察官。非常时期需要非常手段。”
languages.original_text: "A sound plan, Proctor. Only harsh measures can restore order."

traits.locale_text: “这个计划很可靠，监察官。非常时期需要非常手段。”

languages.text: 「理にかなった計画だ、代理人。秩序を回復するには、強硬策しかない」
languages.original_text: "A sound plan, Proctor. Only harsh measures can restore order."

traits.locale_text: 「理にかなった計画だ、代理人。秩序を回復するには、強硬策しかない」

languages.text: "Aklına sağlık Üsteğmen. Düzen, yalnızca sert önlemlerle sağlanabilir."
languages.original_text: "A sound plan, Proctor. Only harsh measures can restore order."

traits.locale_text: "Aklına sağlık Üsteğmen. Düzen, yalnızca sert önlemlerle sağlanabilir."
